title: Open Google Play Store with the list of all applications from your publisher account
You can add a “Browse Our Other Apps” button in your app, listing all your(publisher) applications in the Google Play Store app.

inline_content.Text: You can add a “Browse Our Other Apps” button in your app, listing all your(publisher) applications in the Google Play Store app.

Root.title: Open Google Play Store with the list of all applications from your publisher account
